name: @theorylabs/common-errors
description: Common Errors, thier properties (i.e. err.name, err.code, etc.), methods, classed counter-parts (i.e TypeError, AggregateError, etc.) and more in a Human-Readable format. Essentially provides an importable enum of Error 'things' to check against your Native JavaScript/Node Errors which often produce information that is notoriously tricky to debug without installing a slew of 3rd party tooling.
